# Modello per la stazione `r names(models[[1]][1])`

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
cat(names(models))
```

# AICS 

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
models %>% 
  map(~ map_dbl(.x, AIC)) %>%  
  do.call(cbind, .) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  set_colnames(c('AIC')) %>% 
  round(2) %>% kable() %>% kable_styling() %>%  print()

```

# R squared 

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
models[[1]] %>%
  map(summary.gam) %>%
  map_dbl(~.$r.sq) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  set_colnames(c('R')) %>% 
  round(3) %>% kable() %>% kable_styling() %>%  print()

```

# P-values 

```{r, echo=FALSE}
bv <- getViz(models[[1]][[1]])
b <- mgcv:::anova.gam(models[[1]][[1]]) 
# b$s.table %>%
#   kable(format = "pipe") %>% kable_styling() %>%
#   print()

cat("\n\n")

check(bv, type = "deviance",
      a.qq = list(method = "tnorm", a.cipoly = list(fill = "light blue")),
      a.respoi = list(size = 0.5),
      a.hist = list(bins = 25)) 
cat("\n\n\n")

```

# Plot JD

```{r, echo=FALSE}
indx <- grep("jd", bv[["smooth"]])

plot(sm(bv, indx), allTerms = TRUE, select = 4) + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0) + 
  theme_pulvirus()

o <- plot(sm(bv, indx) ) + ggtitle("Ultimo miglio") +  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(2000,2800))

o + l_fitLine(colour = "red") + l_rug(mapping = aes(x=x, y=y), alpha = 0.8) +
    l_ciLine(mul = 5, colour = "blue", linetype = 2) + 
    l_points(shape = 19, size = 1, alpha = 0.1) + theme_pulvirus()

```
